content:
The English in the statement was a bit hard to understand so I've made some small edits to make it clearer:

"In game there are certain number of players. After game there be hand shaking.
So we have to find how many shake hands take place in team."
->
"In a game there are [[n]] players. After the game there will be hand shaking between all pairs of players.
So we have to find how many hand shakes take place."

Output:
"number of shake hands takes place."
->
"The number of hand shakes that take place."

Nice clash. :)

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Good contribution

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: The code was perfect

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: The description is pretty clear which makes it solvable .

Input section
* Please format n as a [[variable]].
* Please change "int" to "integer".

Output section
* You may remove "Output - to print".

Cases
* Tests and validators should be different. Please revise them so that there are no duplicates.

Thanks.
